sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useCart } from '../context/CartContext'; const Menu = () => { const [activeCategory, setActiveCategory] = useState('coffee'); const { addToCart } = useCart(); const menuItems = { coffee: [ { id: 'coffee-1', name: 'Espresso', price: '$3.50', description: 'Rich, full-bodied coffee with a perfect crema', image: 'data:image/svg+xml,' }, { id: 'coffee-2', name: 'Americano', price: '$4.00', description: 'Espresso with hot water for a smooth, clean taste', image: 'data:image/svg+xml,' }, { id: 'coffee-3', name: 'Cappuccino', price: '$4.50', description: 'Espresso with steamed milk and foam', image: 'data:image/svg+xml,' }, { id: 'coffee-4', name: 'Latte', price: '$5.00', description: 'Espresso with steamed milk and a light layer of foam', image: 'data:image/svg+xml,' }, { id: 'coffee-5', name: 'Mocha', price: '$5.50', description: 'Espresso with chocolate and steamed milk', image: 'data:image/svg+xml,' }, { id: 'coffee-6', name: 'Macchiato', price: '$4.75', description: 'Espresso with a dollop of foam', image: 'data:image/svg+xml,' } ], pastries: [ { id: 'pastry-1', name: 'Croissant', price: '$3.25', description: 'Buttery, flaky pastry perfect with coffee', image: 'data:image/svg+xml,' }, { id: 'pastry-2', name: 'Muffin', price: '$3.75', description: 'Fresh baked daily - blueberry, chocolate chip, or bran', image: 'data:image/svg+xml,' }, { id: 'pastry-3', name: 'Danish', price: '$4.25', description: 'Sweet pastry with fruit filling', image: 'data:image/svg+xml,' }, { id: 'pastry-4', name: 'Bagel', price: '$2.95', description: 'Fresh bagel with cream cheese', image: 'data:image/svg+xml,' }, { id: 'pastry-5', name: 'Scone', price: '$3.50', description: 'Traditional British pastry with jam and cream', image: 'data:image/svg+xml,' } ], sandwiches: [ { id: 'sandwich-1', name: 'Turkey Club', price: '$8.95', description: 'Turkey, bacon, lettuce, tomato on sourdough', image: 'data:image/svg+xml,' }, { id: 'sandwich-2', name: 'Grilled Cheese', price: '$6.95', description: 'Three cheese blend on artisan bread', image: 'data:image/svg+xml,' }, { id: 'sandwich-3', name: 'Veggie Wrap', price: '$7.95', description: 'Fresh vegetables and hummus in a tortilla', image: 'data:image/svg+xml,' }, { id: 'sandwich-4', name: 'Chicken Panini', price: '$9.95', description: 'Grilled chicken with pesto and mozzarella', image: 'data:image/svg+xml,' } ], beverages: [ { id: 'beverage-1', name: 'Fresh Orange Juice', price: '$4.50', description: 'Freshly squeezed orange juice', image: 'data:image/svg+xml,' }, { id: 'beverage-2', name: 'Green Tea', price: '$3.25', description: 'Premium green tea leaves', image: 'data:image/svg+xml,' }, { id: 'beverage-3', name: 'Hot Chocolate', price: '$4.75', description: 'Rich, creamy hot chocolate with whipped cream', image: 'data:image/svg+xml,' }, { id: 'beverage-4', name: 'Iced Tea', price: '$3.50', description: 'Refreshing iced tea with lemon', image: 'data:image/svg+xml,' } ] }; const categories = [ { id: 'coffee', name: 'Coffee', icon: 'fas fa-coffee' }, { id: 'pastries', name: 'Pastries', icon: 'fas fa-cookie-bite' }, { id: 'sandwiches', name: 'Sandwiches', icon: 'fas fa-hamburger' }, { id: 'beverages', name: 'Beverages', icon: 'fas fa-glass-whiskey' } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Our Menu

Discover our carefully crafted selection of coffee, pastries, and more

{/* Menu Categories */}
{categories.map(category => ( ))}
{/* Menu Items */}
{menuItems[activeCategory].map((item, index) => (
{item.name}
{item.price}

{item.description}

))}
{/* Special Offers */}

Special Offers

Morning Special

Any coffee + pastry for $7.50

Lunch Combo

Sandwich + drink for $12.95

Happy Hour

20% off all beverages 3-5 PM

); }; export default Menu;
